Text:
It creates bellboys, announcements and animations in format GIF . 
Easy GIF Animator is a simple application with which you can create animations GIF from your favorite photos. You can add impressive visual effects, to add texts in movement or you will be able to publish and also to modify the images GIF that already you have in your computer . 
Also you can include sound in your creation, can apply transparency effect and it even has ability to handle and to separate the photograms of the animation, being established the time and the duration of each one. When you finalize your creation you will be able to also export it to the Flash format (SWF) or to format AVI . 
-It works with all images GIF, JPG, png and BMP . 
-*Proven in Vista Windows and 7 
-Language: English
